reviews.review: It is a good game for a very small price. Cross platform and allows you to have many hours of fun with friends.
scary and annoying but funny annoying ya know

İndirimde alınır oynanır.

Tek başınıza girecekseniz katil, arkadaşlarınızla oynayacaksanız da 4 kişi kurban olarak oynayabiliyorsunuz bu açıdan oyun diğer oyunlara göre iyi. Diğer oyunlardaki gibi coop ya da solo ağırlığı yok.
游戏很棒画面也很好 然后讲究配合的游戏画风也很棒！！
being tunneled and camped is very fun recommend it.
Fun as long as you play good, can get frustrating when playing bad. I recommend watching Youtubers to learn some tech and how the perks work!
Хорошая игра, где четыре чела насилуют свою погибель морально и физически.
oyun güzel alacaksanız alın bu yorum fikrinizi değiştirmez burdan eniştemin kızının halasının amcasının babasının dayısına selamlar
você pode  jogar com o vilão
This game was fun now the Dev team sought out to ruin random ass perks and mechanics. Gracias but im not touching DBD after this shitshow.

шикарная игра. Совершенно не пожалел, что купил её. Игра имеет очень интересные механики. Обожаю игры, где для того, чтобы отлично играть, необходимо качаться. Игра подойдёт далеко не всем, но лично для меня это лучшая игра
this game is pretty decent. Hitboxes need to be adjusted
je dobrá běžte si ji koupit parchanti (ale DLC by mohla být levnější)
Es un crack el Dead... lo conozco hace banda y la verdad un 10 de persona

Bom, depois de chegar no rank 1 de survivor eu acho que tenho alguma propriedade para falar sobre esse jogo. O jogo é definitivamente bom, dependendo do seu objetivo com ele você pode ter dias ou meses de diversão e até mesmo anos. O principal objetivo desse jogo é remeter a um filme de terror, porém, isso só acontece nas primeiras horas de gameplay, como killer você tem a sensação de usar um assassino de filme pra caçar pessoas online ou até mesmo seus amigos (inclusive é um ótimo jogo para se jogar com amigos), mas conforme avança no jogo você percebe que se trata de algo mais competitivo entre os jogadores do que um jogo simples de terror, como sobrevivente (survivor) você até tem alguns momentos de medo que, conforme você evolui no jogo, se perdem, já que você percebe a força que os sobreviventes tem em relação ao assassino. 
Se o jogo entrega o que ele promete? Sim, muito, a diversão é imensa, joguei por dias e dias e me diverti muito. O sistema de ranking, mesmo falhando algumas vezes, faz algum sentido por ser dividido em sobrevivente e assassino. Existem bugs, alguns deles grandes, porém não me fariam parar de jogar.
O sistema de compra de assassinos e sobreviventes de filmes e jogos (personagens licenciados) é um pouco predatório já que o único jeito de obter eles é comprando as dlcs ou gastando dinheiro a mais o que me faz ficar receoso em relação ao método usado, porém personagens criados pelo próprio jogo e os perks dos licenciados podem ser adquiridos apenas jogando.
A maior dica que eu posso dar pra quem quer adquirir o jogo é esperar uma promoção, que costuma rolar sempre que saem personagens, onde você pode comprar o jogo mais uma dlc pelo preço normal ou até mesmo mais barato (NÃO COMPRE DLCS DE PERSONAGENS ORIGINAIS DO JOGO, esses podem ser adquiridos jogando).

By far one of my to tier games, I enjoy the killer aspect and the survivor aspect in this game, Queues can sometimes take a while, but its totally worth it, unless you play past 12am(it takes a lot longer). I would recommend everyone try this game out, even if you don't enjoy the team part of the game with survivors you can always go to killer and work alone.
this game is a love hate relationship, you either have a fun clutch game where u bully the killer, or you get facecamped, slugged, tunneled and makes you want to refund the game

if u play surv, it will be almost most hard game in your life, i mean if u have a point to escape, otherwise if uu go to play killer it will be easiest shite in your life. you will have two types of game. the first is when the killer plays for fun and then you can save 2,3,4 teammates and game feels like good, fun etc. The second option is quick knock, facecamp, killer ez does 4 kills, it possible because time to die on hook to short, and facecamping legaly allows to do 4 kills in easiest way as it can be. I will tell you honestly, the second option is 80% of DBD. I can tell other plusses and minuses but honestly i dont care. 1200 hours expirience btw. Have a bad day, and bad luck.

这是一个只玩屠夫的胆小好涩玩家。39小时留言。
游戏是好游戏，太好了，玩家也太他娘的强了。
速修，速修，全他娘的是速修。
本来就没技能，地图也没摸透，我一个绿段的硬生生在红段车队的威压之下硬生生从15段上了十段。
然后今天打了一晚上，基本全都是恶灵失望，偶尔有几个暴戾杀手。
全他娘的是红段啊，我一个绿段做错什么了。明明是高考时期，为什么这群人还更凶残了？
累计冲了120块钱，现在已经后悔了。
现在开始玩护士了，血压也高不到哪去了。
太几把好玩了我一天不玩浑身难受，凤敏好漂亮是我滴老婆

Здесь можно бить детей 👍🏻

P.S. ну или подростков 17 лет
A beautiful and fun game, at first you will think that the way to play is simple and intuitive, but you will discover that the matter is deeper than that
i ThInK wE dId A pReTtY gOoD jOb So FaR

I was Fooled by this game. When i saw the game on steam I thought it was just another horror bla bla game. But Daaaaamn Bruh! This game is something else! Almost like its too different games but set in the same game! I dont even know how to describe the game itself.. You just have to try it yourself. 
10/10. 
Oh yeah and PLEASE give us more content like you do now, its amazing and it keeps the game alive and going.
游戏本体包含的人类都很好用，屠夫需要等活动买技能或者肝很久才能玩着舒服，但我觉得每一个屠夫都是一个全新的游戏，完全值得活动打折价格

One of my favourite games to play with friends when I get some free time , its always fun to either go against a really good killer/survivors or against a really bad killer/survivors.
This makes the game more fun and unpredictable , the balance from what I experienced is pretty good , it just takes time to get perks and improve.
es el juego mas desbalanceado que jugué en mi vida, jugar de killer es un infierno

很有意思，最好有一起玩的小伙伴，新玩家别想着要做多么厉害的事，能躲避屠夫蹲一蹲蘑菇起手最容易，能有办法躲了在研究地图点位，不然就得用尸体去堆积经验了，这个路程怕没抗住就退游了吧，所以先躲着能出去感受下快乐才有机会继续玩这个游戏，能玩下去才能研究更多东西啊，这里面不同技能都可以玩不同的玩法，不必要纠结一套技能，搭配不同的技能玩法不一样，有很多不同的乐趣，最好有一起能玩得来的小伙伴，游戏旅程才不会寂寞。
炸魚或是被炸魚，這就是DBD
Gayet Güzel, Ama Eski Tat Yok Gibi..
Great game! mechanics are good though at times frustrating and the community can be quite toxic. But all around generally fun and balanced

Я хочу что бы при стабильном соединении с инетом, в катке где я в соло вывозил меня выкидывало постоянно, особенно когда инет есть, обожаю надпись - "для пользования нужно соединение с интернетом", а особенно супер когда при этом пинг 30, потеря пакетов 0, дс не вылетал
屎一样的匹配机制，我十几段屠夫能匹配到一段的人就离谱，整局游戏连屁股都看不到，游戏体验极差
Really fun to play with friends and strangers!

Зашёл поиграть в соло, меня слили, вишу на крюке, передо мною нах"й клодетка перед палеткой самохил юзает(видно сразу, киберспорт), пох*й что ман в другой части карты, НАДО ЗАХИЛЯТЬСЯ, ВДРУГ Б*ЯТЬ НА ЗЕМЛЮ ПОЛОЖАТ, пох*й,Меня сняли, всё хорошо. Через 5 минут я с адекватным рандомом иду спасать уже другую КЛОДЕТКУ, мы снимаем, чел подставляет спинку, а клодетка бл"ть побежала в другую сторону.... ОКЕЙ, пох"й, клодетку положили. Тип бежит к лежащей клодетке помочь, она ливает, ман ху"рит рандома, вешает, он ливает, остаюсь я с той самой клодеткой, меня нешёл ман, "бнул, повесил, клодетка опять перед палеткой самохил юзает... ТЕБЯ БЛ"ТЬ В КИБЕРСПОРТ НАДО, НАХ"Й ТЫ ПАБЛИК ИГРАЕШЬ. К ней ман подходит и потом её отпускает.... 10 рандомов из 10! Про хиты я молчу.

The game is fun, but you can't change region lobbies. Which means, if it's late for you, you'll never find a team. Would be much better if regions could be changed, or if there was some kind of AI pairing option.
Pretty poggers when you're not being tunneled or face camped :3
